option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# SMS API configuration sms.api.url=https://app.text.lk/api/v3/sms/send # Provided token (keep this secret in production) sms.api.token=2614|D9XyINBtSATfNmcpZmPB6VcOJ80MA0BOs9h7u70d4d0d3119 sms.sender_id=TextLKDemo # Auth header configuration - adjust if API expects a different format sms.auth.header=Authorization sms.auth.prefix=Bearer # Token location: header|query|body sms.api.token.location=header sms.api.token.key=token
# Server port (optional) #server.port=8080
